frames.name: Use Frames (NOT RECOMMENDED !!!)
frames.description: Use Frames instead of Deltatime for updating the macro

click-fixes.name: Click Fixes
click-fixes.description: Adjusts the position of the player whenever you click to fix macros

keybinds.name: Keybinds
keybinds.description: Press a key on your keyboard to change the macro state, check popup for more info

threaded-loading.name: Multithreaded Macro Loading
threaded-loading.description: Loads each macro on a seperate CPU thread

info-additions.name: Additional Info Label Info
info-additions.description: Shows extra information about the bot in the GD info label

info-replace.name: Info Label Replace
info-replace.description: Replaces the info label text instead of adding
